comment.body:
@Sergey-Lyapin @jellizaveta а можете ли вы воспроизвести у себя проблему при использовании приложения AdGuard для Windows/Mac с включённой опцией `Block third-party authorization header` (так как в расширении для браузеров нет такой опции) по шагам отсюда https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/131302#issuecomment-1268505683?

Я конечно постараюсь сделать, что попросил `@Alex-302`, просто мне придётся потратить намного больше времени на это.

issue.title: Find a way to use Akamai's malicious domain research & detection
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Akamai has done some research & detection of newly-registered malicious domains @ https://www.akamai.com/blog/security-research/newly-observed-domains-discovered-8-million-malicious-domains.

### Proposed solution

Find a way to use that, either directly or as inspiration, to improve security via AG.

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body: That's why I mentioned "as inspiration."  It doesn't look like it'd be impossible (just quite a _lot_ of work) to do what's set forth in the post, especially as AG has its own DNS to gather this type of data from.

comment.body:
> this is the only way to contact their support, and uBlock Origin only has a unified AdGuard Annoyances list (compiled for uBlock Origin by your own servers).

Actually you can use sublists on uBO too:
AdGuard Cookie Notices filter: `https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/18.txt`
AdGuard Popups filter: `https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/19.txt`
AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter: `https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/20.txt`
AdGuard Other Annoyances filter: `https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/21.txt`

Or else can add `@@||beacon-v2.helpscout.net^$script,domain=help.getpocket.com` to My filters:.
Why removed this too? I'll revert.

issue.title: www.twitch.tv

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: outlook.live.com
issue.body:

issue.title: www.softpedia.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.softpedia.com/get/Antivirus/BitDefender-Internet-Security.shtml](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.softpedia.com%2Fget%2FAntivirus%2FBitDefender-Internet-Security.shtml) ### Comment > Hello, > > When AG Chrome extension is enabled on this website and when we want to view the screenshots of the programs, we are unable to click on the right-pointing arrow to navigate to the next image and moreover, there is some faint text being displayed. (refer to the attached screenshots). ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/VFCR2pg.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/iOkhpNf.png)

Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Block WebRTC,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties Filters: | Ad Blocking:
